name: Light Riders
description:
Description

Light Riders was made in 72 hours for Mini Jam 58: Neon!

Race against enemies and fight your way to first place! Earn money and upgrade your bike, weapons and character. Only the strongest can finish this race.

Controls

Movement - WASD

Quick Turn - Space

Reset Position - Q

Open Upgrade Menu - Hold Shift

Select Upgrades - 1 / 2 / 3 / 4 / 5 / 6

Upgrades

1 - Health Up

2 - Speed

3 - Damage

4 - Armor

5 - Handling

6 - Bounty (Snipers target enemies from the rooftops)

Future Updates

We hope to be able to add quite a few more features to Light Riders in the future/after submission.

  • Special Attacks - A variety of attacks to destroy your enemies.
  • Battle Royale Mode - Racers will be placed on a small track and they'll have to fight each other to the death while using unique abilities.
  • Network Multiplayer - Link up with your friends online to race each other while social distancing!
  • Dynamic/Reactive Music - We want you to feel the pressure as the stakes get higher.
  • Additional Tracks - More tracks to race on with more interesting visuals.
  • Bike Garage - Unlock permanent upgrades to your bike and customize its looks.
